1.0.0.name: wordpress/helpful-information
1.0.0.description:
Helpful Information adds an element to the default admin bar which contains several bits of helpful information about the page currently being viewed

Information displayed:

  • Current post type
  • Current template file
  • All enqueued and registered scripts
  • All enqueued and registered styles
  • All included files
